title: Starbucks to close 8,000 U.S. stores for racial-bias training
text:
Starbucks to close 8,000 U.S. stores for racial-bias training   01:36 
Starbucks will close 8,000 company-owned U.S. cafes for the afternoon on May 29 to train nearly 175,000 workers on how to prevent racial discrimination in its stores. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Starbucks will close 8,000 company-owned U.S. cafes for the afternoon on May 29 to train nearly 175,000 workers on how to prevent racial discrimination in its stores. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
